articles.title: England's feisty edge in win over Spain helped turn it into an unmissable spectacle - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spain felt an extremely confident England were drowning in complacency about Wednesday's quarter-final being just as much of a breeze as their procession through the group stage.
articles.content: Strange to report, amid the relentless positivity of these Euros, that a member of the Spanish team privately admitted she hoped her countrys national anthem would be booed by the English crowd at Br… [+2655 chars]
